task.title: Add a delegate host to a resource pool

taskbody.context: Use this procedure to add a delegate host to a resource pool. You can use a hostname or an IP address to add a delegate host to a resource pool. If you use a hostname, all of the hosts in your cluster must be able to resolve the name, either through an entry in /etc/hosts, or through a nameserver on the network.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Add a delegate host to a resource pool.
step.stepxmp: Replace Hostname-Or-IP with the hostname or IP address of a delegate host: serviced host add --register Hostname-Or-IP:4979 default
